==Trivia==
* {{w|Trinidad}} is an island in the southernmost part of the {{w|West Indies}} of the {{w|Carribean|Carribeans}}, a part of {{w|Trinidad and Tobago}}.
** ''Trinidad'' means {{w|Trinity}} in Spanish.
